name: ESTATE OF Harold R. SCHMIDT, Deceased. Appeal of The SQUARE 106 ASSOCIATES

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: ESTATE OF Harold R. SCHMIDT, Deceased. Appeal of The SQUARE 106 ASSOCIATES.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Richard B. Tucker, III, Pittsburgh, John P. McKenna, Washington, DC, pro hac vice, for appellants.

casebody.head_matter:
619 A.2d 1058
ESTATE OF Harold R. SCHMIDT, Deceased. Appeal of The SQUARE 106 ASSOCIATES.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1998.
Decided Feb. 16, 1993.
Richard B. Tucker, III, Pittsburgh, John P. McKenna, Washington, DC, pro hac vice, for appellants.
Edward C. Schmidt, Pittsburgh, for Wickwire-Exee.
Richard DiSalle, Edmund M. Carney, Pittsburgh, for Rose, Asbaugh.
Thomas C. Reed, Pittsburgh, for Angel.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
